00064 struct block_header
00065 {
00066     typedef detail::atomic_count count_type;
00067 
00068     count_type count_;                                                          
00069     mutable block_header * redir_;                                      
00071         bool destroy_;                                                                  
00072     intrusive_list::node tag_;                                          
00074     intrusive_list includes_;                                           
00075     intrusive_list elements_;                                           
00077         static mutex & static_mutex()
00078         {
00079                 static mutex mutex_;
00080                 
00081                 return mutex_;
00082         }
00083 
00084 
00089         static fast_pool_allocator<block_header> & static_pool()
00090         {
00091         static fast_pool_allocator<block_header> pool_;
00092         
00093         return pool_;
00094     }
00095 
00100     block_header() : count_(1), redir_(this), destroy_(false)
00101     {
00102         includes_.push_back(& tag_);
00103     }
00104 
00105         
00112     bool release()
00113     {
00114         if (-- count_ == 0)
00115         {
00116                         destroy_ = true;
00117                         
00118             for (intrusive_list::iterator<block_base, & block_base::block_tag_> i; i = elements_.begin(), i != elements_.end(); )
00119                 delete &* i;
00120                 
00121                         destroy_ = false;
00122             
00123             for (intrusive_list::iterator<block_header, & block_header::tag_> i = includes_.begin(), j; j = i, i != includes_.end(); i = j)
00124                         { 
00125                                 ++ j;
00126                                 
00127                 if (&* i != this)
00128                     delete &* i;
00129                         }
00130 
00131             return true;
00132         }
00133 
00134         return false;
00135     }
00136 
00137         
00144     block_header * redir() const
00145     {
00146         while (redir_ != redir_->redir_)
00147                 redir_ = redir_->redir_;
00148         
00149         return redir_;
00150     }
00151         
00152         
00159     void redir(block_header * p)
00160     {
00161         if (redir_ != p)
00162         {
00163             redir_ = p;
00164             redir_->includes_.merge(includes_);
00165             redir_->elements_.merge(elements_);
00166             new (& redir_->count_) count_type(redir_->count_ + count_); 
00167         }
00168     }
00169 
00170         
00178     void * operator new (size_t s)
00179     {
00180         return static_pool().allocate(s);
00181     }
00182     
00183         
00192     void * operator new (size_t s, block_header * p)
00193     {
00194         return p;
00195     }
00196 
00197         
00204     void operator delete (void * p)
00205     {
00206         static_pool().deallocate(static_cast<block_header *>(p), sizeof(block_header));
00207     }
00208 };

00211 #define TEMPLATE_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) typename T ## n
00212 #define ARGUMENT_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) T ## n const & t ## n
00213 #define PARAMETER_DECL(z, n, text) BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(n) t ## n
00214 
00215 #define BEFRIEND_MAKE_BLOCK(z, n, text)                                                                                                                                                         \
00216         template <typename V, BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, TEMPLATE_DECL, 0)>                                                                                                 \
00217                 friend block_ptr<V> text(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, ARGUMENT_DECL, 0));
00218 
00219 #define CONSTRUCT_MAKE_BLOCK(z, n, text)                                                                                                                                                            \
00220         template <typename V, BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, TEMPLATE_DECL, 0)>                                                                                                 \
00221                 block_ptr<V> text(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, ARGUMENT_DECL, 0))                                                                                                                 \
00222                 {                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00223                         return block_ptr<V>(new block<V>(BOOST_PP_REPEAT(n, PARAMETER_DECL, 0)));                                                                       \
00224                 }

00233 template <typename T>
00234     class block_ptr : public block_ptr_base<T>
00235     {
00236         template <typename> friend class block_ptr;
00237 
00238         typedef block_ptr_base<T> base;
00239         
00240         using base::share;
00241                 using base::po_;
00242 
00243         union
00244         {
00245             block_header * ps_;                                         
00246             intrusive_stack::node pn_;                          
00247         };
00248 
00249 #ifdef BOOST_BP_USE_RAW_POINTER
00250         public:
00251 #endif
00252 
00258         template <typename V>
00259             block_ptr(block<V> * p) : base(p)
00260             {
00261                 if (! pool::is_from(this))
00262                 {
00263                     ps_ = new block_header();
00264 
00265                     init(p);
00266                 }
00267                 else
00268                 {
00269                     pool::top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00270                     pool::top(this)->inits_.merge(p->inits_);
00271                 }
00272             }
00273 
00274                 
00281         template <typename V>
00282             block_ptr & operator = (block<V> * p)
00283             {
00284 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00285                         mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(block_header::static_mutex());
00286 #endif
00287 
00288                 release(false);
00289 
00290                 init(p);
00291 
00292                 base::operator = (p);
00293 
00294                 return * this;
00295             }
00296 
00297         template <typename V>
00298                 void reset(block<V> * p)
00299                 {
00300                     operator = <T>(p);
00301                 }
00302             
00303                 template <typename V>
00304                         friend block_ptr<V> make_block();
00305 
00306                 BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(1, 10, BEFRIEND_MAKE_BLOCK, make_block)
00307 
00308     public:
00309         typedef T                       value_type;
00310         typedef block<value_type>     element_type;
00311 
00312 
00317         block_ptr() : ps_(0)
00318         {
00319             if (! pool::is_from(this))
00320                 ps_ = new block_header();
00321             else
00322                 pool::top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00323         }
00324 
00325                 
00332         template <typename V>
00333             block_ptr(block_ptr<V> const & p) : base(p)
00334             {
00335                 if (! pool::is_from(this))
00336                     ps_ = new block_header();
00337                 else
00338                     pool::top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00339 
00340                 ps_->redir()->redir(p.ps_->redir());
00341             }
00342 
00343                 
00350                         block_ptr(block_ptr<T> const & p) : base(p)
00351             {
00352                 if (! pool::is_from(this))
00353                     ps_ = new block_header();
00354                 else
00355                     pool::top(this)->ptrs_.push(& pn_);
00356                                 
00357                 ps_->redir()->redir(p.ps_->redir());

00367         template <typename V>
00368             block_ptr & operator = (block_ptr<V> const & p)
00369             {
00370 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00371                         mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(block_header::static_mutex());
00372 #endif
00373 
00374                 if (ps_->redir() != p.ps_->redir())
00375                 {
00376                     release(false);
00377                                         
00378                         ps_->redir()->redir(p.ps_->redir());
00379                 }
00380                 base::operator = (p);
00381 
00382                 return * this;
00383             }
00384

00392         block_ptr & operator = (block_ptr<T> const & p)
00393         {
00394             return operator = <T>(p);
00395         }
00396 
00397         void reset()
00398         {
00399 #ifndef BOOST_DISABLE_THREADS
00400                 mutex::scoped_lock scoped_lock(block_header::static_mutex());
00401 #endif
00402 
00403             release(false);
00404         }
00405         
00406         template <typename V>
00407                 void reset(block_ptr<V> const & p)
00408                 {
00409                     operator = <T>(p);
00410                 }
00411         
00412         bool cyclic() const
00413         {
00414                 return ps_->redir()->destroy_;
00415         }
00416 
00417         ~block_ptr()
00418         {
00419                         if (cyclic())
00420                                 base::po_ = 0;
00421                         else
00422                                 release(true);
00423         }
00424 
00425     private:
00432         void release(bool d)
00433         {
00434             base::reset();
00435             
00436             if (! pool::is_from(this))
00437             {
00438                         block_header * p = ps_->redir();
00439         
00440                 if (p->release())
00441                     if (! d)
00442                     {
00443                         p->~block_header();
00444                         ps_ = new (p) block_header();
00445                     }
00446                     else
00447                         delete p;
00448                 else 
00449                                         if (! d)
00450                         ps_ = new block_header();
00451             }
00452         }
00453 
00454                 
00461         void init(block_base * p)
00462         {
00463             if (p->init_)
00464                 return;
00465 
00466                 block_header * q = ps_->redir();
00467         
00468                         // iterate memory blocks
00469             for (intrusive_list::iterator<block_base, & block_base::init_tag_> i = p->inits_.begin(); i != p->inits_.end(); ++ i)
00470             {
00471                 i->init_ = true;
00472                 q->elements_.push_back(& i->block_tag_);
00473 
00474                                 // iterate block_ptr elements
00475                 for (intrusive_stack::iterator<block_ptr, & block_ptr::pn_> j = i->ptrs_.begin(), k; k = j, j != i->ptrs_.end(); j = k)
00476                                 {
00477                                         ++ k;
00478                     j->ps_ = ps_;
00479                                 }
00480             }
00481         }
00482 
00483         public:
00484 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_RVALUE_REFS)
00485         block_ptr(block_ptr<T> && p): base(std::move(p.po_)), ps_(std::move(p.ps_))
00486         {
00487         }
00488 
00489         template<class Y>
00490                 block_ptr(block_ptr<Y> && p): base(std::move(p.po_)), ps_(std::move(p.ps_))
00491                 {
00492                 }
00493 
00494         block_ptr<T> & operator = (block_ptr<T> && p)
00495         {
00496                 po_ = std::move(p.po_);
00497                 ps_ = std::move(p.ps_);
00498                 
00499                 return *this;
00500         }
00501 
00502         template<class Y>
00503                 block_ptr & operator = (block_ptr<Y> && p)
00504                 {
00505                         po_ = std::move(p.po_);
00506                         ps_ = std::move(p.ps_);
00507                         
00508                         return *this;
00509                 }
00510 #endif

00513 template <typename V>
00514         block_ptr<V> make_block()
00515         {
00516                 return block_ptr<V>(new block<V>());
